short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube playback speed controller that lets you experience more in less time. YouTubeFast, your time is valuable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save time while you enjoy your favourite YouTube content with YouTubeFast, the easy-to-use tool that pushes YouTube beyond its 2x speed limit. Enjoy fine-tuned control over video speed using the on-screen panel or keyboard hotkeys.



Features:
• Suit YouTubeFast to your needs with fully customisable speed, hotkey and visual settings featuring multi-key hotkey support and default video speed options.
• Keep your privacy! YouTubeFast collects zero data and requires no permissions.
• Seamlessly integrated into YouTube's interface with a modern, minimalist design which takes nothing away from your viewing experience.



Notes:
• To apply changes in settings, refresh the page.
• Open the settings page via:
   - While on YouTube, click the YouTubeFast icon or press Shift + S.
   - Click options in the extensions menu.  



Disclaimer: 
YouTubeFast is not affiliated with YouTube in any way. As such, any changes made to YouTube may result in the extension not working as expected. In any case, please report the issue.
